data.eml:eml: The first Myrmecotypus O. P. - Cambridge (Araneae: Corinnidae) from Argentina: description of Myrmecotypus iguazu new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rubio, Gonzalo D., Arbino, Manuel O. (2009): The first Myrmecotypus O. P. - Cambridge (Araneae: Corinnidae) from Argentina: description of Myrmecotypus iguazu new species. Zootaxa 2158: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275060
